history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: expf_y0_y_1,expf. qsimpl time: 1 use: expf_y0_y_1,expf.

ctx: intros m x y j Hmap Hprec.
set (m1 := L m one x y).
exceptions.tactic: assert (Hexpf_y0_y_1 : expf m y0 y_1) by (apply expf_y0_y_1; auto).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

ctx: intros m x y j Hmap Hprec.
set (m1 := L m one x y).
exceptions.tactic: assert (Hd_eq : dx = dy_1) by (apply degree_y0_y_1; auto).
exceptions.exn: The reference dx was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m x y j Hmap Hprec.
set (m1 := L m one x y).
intros m x y j Hmap Hprec.
set (m1 := L m one x y).
exceptions.tactic: assert (H0 : Iter (cF m1) dx x = y_1) by (apply cF_L1_x10; auto).
exceptions.exn: The reference dx was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m x y j Hmap Hprec.
set (m1 := L m one x y).
exceptions.tactic: assert (H1 : j + dx <= dx) by omega.
exceptions.exn: The reference dx was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m x y j Hmap Hprec.
set (m1 := L m one x y).
exceptions.tactic: assert (H2 : Iter (cF m1) (j + dx) x = Iter (cF m1) j y_1) by (apply Iter_plus_eq with dx; auto; omega).
exceptions.exn: The reference dx was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m x y j Hmap Hprec.
set (m1 := L m one x y).
exceptions.exn: Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros m x y j Hmap Hprec. set (m1 := L m one x y). set (y0 := cA m zero y). set (y_1 := cA_1 m one y). set (dx := MF.degree m x). set (dy_1 := MF.degree m y_1). intros Hnotexpf Hle. assert (Hexpf_y0_y_1 : expf m y0 y_1) by (apply expf_y0_y_1; auto). assert (Hd_eq : dx = dy_1) by (apply degree_y0_y_1; auto). rewrite Hd_eq in Hle. assert (H0 : Iter (cF m1) dx x = y_1) by (apply cF_L1_x10; auto). assert (H1 : j + dx <= dx) by omega. assert (H2 : Iter (cF m1) (j + dx) x = Iter (cF m1) j y_1) by (apply Iter_plus_eq with dx; auto; omega). rewrite <- H2 in H0. assert (H3 : Iter (cF m) j y_1 = Iter (cF m1) j y_1) by (apply cF_L1_x_x10; auto). rewrite <- H3. auto.
